name: smart-home-automation
description: A research project by MDC. This project focuses on creating automation tools for smart homes.

scripts.start:backend: npm run start:backend:win || npm run start:backend:mac
scripts.start: npm run start:win || npm run start:mac
scripts.activate-env: npm run activate-env:win || npm run activate-env:mac
scripts.postinstall:win: npm run install:front-end && npm run create-env:win && npm run activate-env:win && npm run install:back-end
scripts.postinstall:mac: npm run install:front-end && npm run create-env:mac && npm run activate-env:mac && npm run install:back-end
scripts.postinstall: npm run postinstall:win || npm run postinstall:mac
